message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.MM 

The paper deals with metric learning and verification, which are common topics in machine learning and computer vision. The use of an end-to-end approach and the focus on learning the right distance suggest that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). However, the paper also mentions the evaluation of the proposed method under the verification setting, which is a common task in computer vision and multimedia analysis. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.MM (Multimedia) are also likely sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of likelihood ratios and hypothesis tests, which are common in statistical learning and inference, suggesting that cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) could also be a relevant sub-category. Finally, the paper mentions the use of downstream classifiers, which are commonly used in natural language processing, suggesting that cs.CL (Computation and Language) could also be a possible sub-category.
